sqlMap.select:
SELECT ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, NVL(ZC_ITEM_VAL,0.00) ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, NVL(ZC_MER_M_PRICE,0.00) ZC_MER_M_PRICE, NVL(ZC_HT_BI_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, NVL(ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, NVL(ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,0.00) ZC_HT_GK_MONEY, NVL(ZC_ITEM_SUM,0.00) ZC_ITEM_SUM, NVL(BUDGET_BI_MONEY,0.00) BUDGET_BI_MONEY, NVL(BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,0.00) BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,
NVL(ZC_CAIG_MONEY,0.00) ZC_CAIG_MONEY, NVL(ZC_CAIG_PRICE,0.00) ZC_CAIG_PRICE, ZC_CAIG_JLDW FROM ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM
order by $orderByClause$
select * from ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM where ZC_CTGRY_ID = #zcCtgryId:DECIMAL# and ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM where ZC_CTGRY_ID = #zcCtgryId:DECIMAL# and ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM (ZC_CTGRY_ID, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_YEAR, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_IS_JNJS, ZC_BRA_NAME, ZC_MER_SPEC, ZC_ITEM_VAL, ZC_CAIG_SHL, ZC_SP_NAME, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, ZC_MER_M_PRICE, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY,ZC_ITEM_SUM,BUDGET_BI_MONEY,BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY,ZC_CAIG_JLDW,ZC_CAIG_PRICE,ZC_CAIG_MONEY) values (#zcCtgryId:DECIMAL#, #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcYear:CHAR#, #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, #zcIsJnjs:VARCHAR#, #zcBraName:VARCHAR#, #zcMerSpec:VARCHAR#, #zcItemVal:DECIMAL#, #zcCaigShl:DECIMAL#, #zcSpName:VARCHAR#, #zcMerIsZzcx:VARCHAR#, #zcMerIsLshb:VARCHAR#, #zcMerMPrice:DECIMAL#, #zcHtBiMoney:DECIMAL#, #zcHtOtherMoney:DECIMAL#, #zcHtGkMoney:DECIMAL#,#zcItemSum:DECIMAL#,#budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#,#budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#,#zcCaigJldw#,#zcCaigPrice#,#zcCaigMoney#)

sqlMap.update:
update ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM
ZC_CTGRY_ID = #record.zcCtgryId:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_CODE = #record.zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_YEAR = #record.zcYear:CHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #record.zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #record.zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#
ZC_IS_JNJS = #record.zcIsJnjs:VARCHAR#
ZC_BRA_NAME = #record.zcBraName:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_SPEC = #record.zcMerSpec:VARCHAR#
ZC_ITEM_VAL = #record.zcItemVal:DECIMAL#
ZC_CAIG_SHL = #record.zcCaigShl:DECIMAL#
ZC_SP_NAME = #record.zcSpName:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX = #record.zcMerIsZzcx:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_IS_LSHB = #record.zcMerIsLshb:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_M_PRICE = #record.zcMerMPrice:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_BI_MONEY = #record.zcHtBiMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY = #record.zcHtOtherMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_GK_MONEY = #record.zcHtGkMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_CAIG_JLDW = #record.zcCaigJldw:VARCHAR#
ZC_CAIG_PRICE = #record.zcCaigPrice:DECIMAL#
ZC_CAIG_MONEY = #record.zcCaigMoney:DECIMAL#

update ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM set ZC_CTGRY_ID = #record.zcCtgryId:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_CODE = #record.zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_YEAR = #record.zcYear:CHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #record.zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #record.zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_JNJS = #record.zcIsJnjs:VARCHAR#, ZC_BRA_NAME = #record.zcBraName:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_SPEC = #record.zcMerSpec:VARCHAR#, ZC_ITEM_VAL = #record.zcItemVal:DECIMAL#, ZC_CAIG_SHL = #record.zcCaigShl:DECIMAL#, ZC_SP_NAME = #record.zcSpName:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX = #record.zcMerIsZzcx:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB = #record.zcMerIsLshb:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_M_PRICE = #record.zcMerMPrice:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY = #record.zcHtBiMoney:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY = #record.zcHtOtherMoney:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY = #record.zcHtGkMoney:DECIMAL#,
ZC_CAIG_JLDW = #record.zcCaigJldw:VARCHAR#, ZC_CAIG_PRICE = #record.zcCaigPrice:DECIMAL#, ZC_CAIG_MONEY = #record.zcCaigMoney:DECIMAL#

update ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM
ZC_YEAR = #zcYear:CHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#
ZC_IS_JNJS = #zcIsJnjs:VARCHAR#
ZC_BRA_NAME = #zcBraName:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_SPEC = #zcMerSpec:VARCHAR#
ZC_ITEM_VAL = #zcItemVal:DECIMAL#
ZC_CAIG_SHL = #zcCaigShl:DECIMAL#
ZC_SP_NAME = #zcSpName:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX = #zcMerIsZzcx:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_IS_LSHB = #zcMerIsLshb:VARCHAR#
ZC_MER_M_PRICE = #zcMerMPrice:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_BI_MONEY = #zcHtBiMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY = #zcHtOtherMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_HT_GK_MONEY = #zcHtGkMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_ITEM_SUM = #zcItemSum:DECIMAL#
BUDGET_BI_MONEY = #budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#
BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY = #budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#
ZC_CAIG_JLDW = #zcCaigJldw:VARCHAR#
ZC_CAIG_PRICE = #zcCaigPrice:DECIMAL#
ZC_CAIG_MONEY = #zcCaigMoney:DECIMAL#
where ZC_CTGRY_ID = #zcCtgryId:DECIMAL# and ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#

update ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM set ZC_YEAR = #zcYear:CHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE = #zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME = #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_JNJS = #zcIsJnjs:VARCHAR#, ZC_BRA_NAME = #zcBraName:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_SPEC = #zcMerSpec:VARCHAR#, ZC_ITEM_VAL = #zcItemVal:DECIMAL#, ZC_CAIG_SHL = #zcCaigShl:DECIMAL#, ZC_SP_NAME = #zcSpName:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX = #zcMerIsZzcx:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_IS_LSHB = #zcMerIsLshb:VARCHAR#, ZC_MER_M_PRICE = #zcMerMPrice:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_BI_MONEY = #zcHtBiMoney:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY = #zcHtOtherMoney:DECIMAL#, ZC_HT_GK_MONEY = #zcHtGkMoney:DECIMAL#, ZC_ITEM_SUM = #zcItemSum:DECIMAL#, BUDGET_BI_MONEY = #budgetBiMoney:DECIMAL#, BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY = #budgetOtherMoney:DECIMAL#,
ZC_CAIG_JLDW = #zcCaigJldw:VARCHAR#, ZC_CAIG_PRICE = #zcCaigPrice:DECIMAL#, ZC_CAIG_MONEY = #zcCaigMoney:DECIMAL#
where ZC_CTGRY_ID = #zcCtgryId:DECIMAL# and ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select '' ZC_CTGRY_ID, '' ZC_HT_CODE p.nd ZC_YEAR, pd.zc_catalogue_code ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, pd.zc_catalogue_name ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, '' ZC_IS_JNJS, s.SP_BRAND ZC_BRA_NAME, pd.BASE_REQ ZC_MER_SPEC, 0 ZC_ITEM_VAL, s.SP_NUM ZC_CAIG_SHL, s.sp_name ZC_SP_NAME, '' ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, '' ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, 0 ZC_MER_M_PRICE, 0 ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, 0 ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, 0 ZC_HT_GK_MONEY, 0 ZC_ITEM_SUM, 0 BUDGET_BI_MONEY, 0 BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, u.val ZC_CAIG_JLDW, d.sp_price ZC_CAIG_PRICE, d.sp_total_sum ZC_CAIG_MONEY from zc_eb_rfq_pack v, zc_eb_xunjia s, zc_eb_xunjia_baojia p, zc_eb_xunjia_baojia_detail d, ZC_EB_PACK_REQ_DETAIL pd, (select * from as_val where valset_id='V_SP_UNIT') u where v.pack_code=#packCode# and v.win_bid_provider_code = p.supplier_code and v.proj_code = p.proj_code and v.pack_code = s.pack_code and v.proj_code = s.proj_code and p.bj_code = d.bj_code and s.xj_code = d.xj_code and d.xj_code=pd.detail_code and d.unit = u.val_id(+) s.nd ZC_YEAR, PROCURE_TYPE ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, '' ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, decode(d.is_energy_saving,'Y','Y',decode(d.is_warter_saving,'Y','Y','N')) ZC_IS_JNJS, d.PROD_BRAND ZC_BRA_NAME, d.PROD_TYPE ZC_MER_SPEC, 0 ZC_ITEM_VAL, d.PROD_NUM ZC_CAIG_SHL, d.PROD_NAME ZC_SP_NAME, d.IS_INNOVATIVE ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, d.IS_ENVIRONMENT_PROTECTION ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, 0 ZC_MER_M_PRICE, 0 ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, 0 ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, 0 ZC_HT_GK_MONEY, 0 ZC_ITEM_SUM, 0 BUDGET_BI_MONEY, 0 BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, d.NUM_UNIT ZC_CAIG_JLDW, d.PROD_PRICE ZC_CAIG_PRICE, d.PROD_PRICE*d.PROD_NUM ZC_CAIG_MONEY from zc_eb_eval_report v, zc_eb_signup s, zc_eb_signup_pack p, Zc_Eb_Sup_Price_Detail d where v.pack_code=#packCode# and v.proj_code = s.proj_code and v.provider_code = s.provider_code and v.pack_code = p.pack_code and s.signup_id = p.signup_id and p.signup_pack_id = d.signup_pack_id s.nd ZC_YEAR, PROCURE_TYPE ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, '' ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, decode(d.is_energy_saving,'Y','Y',decode(d.is_warter_saving,'Y','Y','N')) ZC_IS_JNJS, d.PROD_BRAND ZC_BRA_NAME, d.PROD_TYPE ZC_MER_SPEC, 0 ZC_ITEM_VAL, d.PROD_NUM ZC_CAIG_SHL, d.PROD_NAME ZC_SP_NAME, d.IS_INNOVATIVE ZC_MER_IS_ZZCX, d.IS_ENVIRONMENT_PROTECTION ZC_MER_IS_LSHB, 0 ZC_MER_M_PRICE, 0 ZC_HT_BI_MONEY, 0 ZC_HT_OTHER_MONEY, 0 ZC_HT_GK_MONEY, 0 ZC_ITEM_SUM, 0 BUDGET_BI_MONEY, 0 BUDGET_OTHER_MONEY, d.NUM_UNIT ZC_CAIG_JLDW, d.PROD_PRICE ZC_CAIG_PRICE, d.PROD_PRICE*d.PROD_NUM ZC_CAIG_MONEY from zc_eb_eval_report v, zc_eb_signup s, zc_eb_signup_pack p, Zc_Eb_Sup_Price_Detail d where v.pack_code=#packCode# and v.proj_code = s.proj_code and v.provider_code = s.provider_code and v.pack_code = p.pack_code and s.signup_id = p.signup_id and p.signup_pack_id = d.signup_pack_id
select * from ZC_T_BCHT_ITEM where ZC_HT_CODE in ($value$)
